Adam Whitcroft

Designer and game nut

I'm a South African born designer living in the United Kingdom with my beautiful wife. I've released several well known icon projects1 alongside other open source design helpers2, taught a successful Skillshare3 course and was interviewed by The Industry4 a little while back.
